title: Saffron Cruise
address: Level 20, Teda Building, 87 Wing Lok Street, Sheung Wan
desc: Whether you are looking for a private boat to cruise around the islands of Hong Kong, a unique venue for your party, or to impress your corporate clients by sailing in the harbour on our traditional 3 mast sailing junk Wing Sing - Saffron Cruises have the best boat charter options in Hong Kong.
Our experienced crew can take you to any of the 300+ islands that make up Hong Kong and even stay overnight in a secluded bay.
